channel.title: The wild won't change... pictures

item.title: The wild won't change... pictures
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) { return true; } }

item.title: The wild won't change... pictures
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Change it too:

	public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
		if (Type == 1) {
			if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) {
				return true;
			}
		} else if (Type == 2) {
			if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) {
				return true;
			}
		}
		return false;
	}

Enjoy.

Read full topic

item.title: The wild won't change... pictures
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

this is the code i changed the original one to… the original code made the slayer tower wild.

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3493 && coordX <= 3415 && coordX >= 3453) { return true; } } return true; }
(that code is to make infront of slayer tower the wild)
